sentences.en: All Xiangzi's bitterness, shame and hopelessness were packed into this one sentence.
sentences.cn: 这一句话说尽了祥子心中的委屈, 羞愧,与无可如何.

sentences.en: But underneath the humour is an edge of bitterness.
sentences.cn: 但是幽默的背后却透着怨气。

sentences.en: Her cup of bitterness was full.
I still feel bitterness and anger towards the person who knocked me down.
sentences.cn: 我仍然对撞倒我的人愤恨不已。

sentences.en: If you have tasted the bitterness of gall , you know better the sweetness of honey.
sentences.cn: 吃过黄连苦, 更知蜜糖甜.

sentences.en: It was not difficult for him to catch the note of bitterness in my voice.
sentences.cn: 他不难听出我话语中的愤愤不平。

sentences.en: ON WHY THE POOR SHOULD BE HAPPY: “Nobody has the excuse of ‘lack of money’ for not being at peace and living in integrity,” writes one survey respondent of his family, with a touch of bitterness.
sentences.cn: 关于为什么穷人应该是快乐的：“没有人会因为没有钱这个借口而过的不平和和不完整，”某个调查对象在说到关于他的家庭的时候，带着一点痛苦的意味。

sentences.en: She was full of hatred and bitterness.
Suffering was easier to bear than the bitterness he felt corroding his spirit.
sentences.cn: 相较于他感觉正在侵蚀他灵魂的痛苦而言，这种折磨倒更容易承受。

sentences.en: That was the very reason why he felt a certain bitterness.
sentences.cn: 那就是为什么他感到有些痛苦。

sentences.en: The Black people were grateful to have found a way to express their anger and bitterness.
sentences.cn: 黑人找到了表示愤怒和痛苦的方法很高兴.

sentences.en: The flowers of the hop plant add bitterness to the beer.
sentences.cn: 忽布花可增加啤酒的苦味。

sentences.en: The Los Angeles riots reflected the bitterness between the black and Korean communities in the city.
sentences.cn: 洛杉矶的暴乱反映出这个城市的黑人社区和韩裔社区之间的仇恨。

sentences.en: The pay cut caused bitterness among the staff.
sentences.cn: 降低工资使职员们十分愤懑。

sentences.en: The rift within the organization reflects the growing bitterness of the dispute.
sentences.cn: 组织内部严重失和反映出矛盾日趋升级。

sentences.en: There was a strain of bitterness in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他的声音听起来有些愤愤不平。

sentences.en: They like bitterness in foods as well as saltiness.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢食物中的苦味和咸味。

sentences.en: When he spoke his voice was thick with bitterness.
sentences.cn: 他说话时，声音低沉，充满痛苦。
